verses.verse: Praise <S%H8416><s%> waits <S%H1747><s%> for you <S%H430><s%>, O God, in Sion <S%H6726><s%>: and unto you shall the vow <S%H5088><s%> be performed <S%H7999><s%>.
O you that hear <S%H8085><s%> prayer <S%H8605><s%>, unto you shall all flesh <S%H1320><s%> come <S%H935><s%>.
Iniquities <S%H1697><s%> prevail <S%H1396><s%> against me <S%H6588><s%>: as for our transgressions, you shall purge them away <S%H3722><s%>.

Blessed <S%H835><s%> is the man whom you choose <S%H977><s%>, and cause to approach <S%H7126><s%> unto you <S%H7931><s%>, that he may live in your courts <S%H2691><s%>: we shall be satisfied <S%H7646><s%> with the goodness <S%H2898><s%> of your house <S%H1004><s%>, even of your holy <S%H6918><s%> temple <S%H1964><s%>.

By terrible things <S%H3372><s%> in righteousness <S%H6664><s%> will you answer <S%H6030><s%> us <S%H430><s%>, O God of our salvation <S%H3468><s%>; who are the confidence <S%H4009><s%> of all the ends <S%H7099><s%> of the earth <S%H776><s%>, and of them that are afar off <S%H7350><s%> upon the sea <S%H3220><s%>:
Which by his strength <S%H3581><s%> sets fast <S%H3559><s%> the mountains <S%H2022><s%>; being girded <S%H247><s%> with power <S%H1369><s%>:
Which stills <S%H7623><s%> the noise <S%H7588><s%> of the seas <S%H3220><s%>, the noise <S%H7588><s%> of their waves <S%H1530><s%>, and the tumult <S%H1995><s%> of the people <S%H3816><s%>.

They also that live <S%H3427><s%> in the outermost parts <S%H7099><s%> are afraid <S%H3372><s%> at your signs <S%H226><s%>: you make the outgoings <S%H4161><s%> of the morning <S%H1242><s%> and evening <S%H6153><s%> to rejoice <S%H7442><s%>.

You visit <S%H6485><s%> the earth <S%H776><s%>, and water <S%H7783><s%> it <S%H7227><s%>: you greatly enrich <S%H6238><s%> it with the river <S%H6388><s%> of God <S%H430><s%>, which is full <S%H4390><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>: you prepare <S%H3559><s%> them corn <S%H1715><s%>, when you have so provided for it <S%H3559><s%>.

You water <S%H7301><s%> the ridges <S%H8525><s%> there abundantly <S%H7301><s%>: you settle <S%H5181><s%> the furrows <S%H1417><s%> there <S%H4127><s%>: you make it soft with showers <S%H7241><s%>: you bless <S%H1288><s%> the springing there <S%H6780><s%>.
You crown <S%H5849><s%> the year <S%H8141><s%> with your goodness <S%H2896><s%>; and your paths <S%H4570><s%> drop <S%H7491><s%> fatness <S%H1880><s%>.
They drop <S%H7491><s%> upon the pastures <S%H4999><s%> of the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>: and the little hills <S%H1389><s%> rejoice <S%H1524><s%> on every side <S%H2296><s%>.

The pastures <S%H3733><s%> are clothed <S%H3847><s%> with flocks <S%H6629><s%>; the valleys <S%H6010><s%> also are covered over <S%H5848><s%> with corn <S%H1250><s%>; they shout for joy <S%H7321><s%>, they also sing <S%H7891><s%>.
